programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel
programme.desc: In this week's study, we consider the Samaritans. Who were they? Why was the relation between Jews and Samaritans so contentious? Though commerce between the two nations continued, other interactions were taboo. The Jews would not borrow from Samaritans or even receive a favor from them. Within this context, John shares the encounters between Jesus, the woman by the well, and the people of the Samaritan city of Sychar.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.desc: John Bachman focuses on the biggest news from D.C., N.Y., and around America.

programme.title: The Record with Greta Van Susteren Weekly
programme.desc: Greta Van Susteren gives the big news from D.C., N.Y., across America, and around the world.

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano

programme.title: RFK JR: Uncensored
programme.desc: The interview with RFK Jr., the presidential candidate, delves into his background, his policy positions, his commitment to national unity, restoring American values, and his motivation for running as the alternative to Joe Biden.

programme.title: Kamala's California Disaster
programme.desc: Rob Finnerty talks about the Golden State, a state that has issues with crime, taxes and fleeing citizens.

programme.title: Trump and Me: A Conversation with Ron Kessler
programme.desc: Washington insider and journalist Ron Kessler offers an in-depth look at the life and legacy of President Donald Trump.

programme.title: The Secret Billionaires
programme.desc: Rob Schmitt exposes dark money from billionaires like Soros trying to stop Trump from winning.

programme.title: Blind Ambition: The Kamala Harris Story
programme.desc: Known as the most liberal U.S. senator and "Border Czar," VP Kamala Harris has a long track record of policy positions; an in-depth look.

programme.title: Woke America
programme.desc: The campaign to transform America.

programme.title: Ronald Reagan: His Winning Wit
programme.desc: President Reagan was known as the great communicator; he established a bond with his audience and endeared himself to his fellow Americans; some of his funniest and greatest moments and how he became one of our nation's most beloved presidents.

programme.title: D-Day: The Day That Won the War
programme.desc: Exploring the strategic gamble that became the most decisive victory for the allied forces.

programme.title: The Great Nazi Escape
programme.desc: Europe became a dangerous place to be associated with the Nazi regime as thousands of Nazi officers, party members and supporters of Hitler began to flee Germany.

programme.title: Inside the Mind of Vladimir Putin: Ascension
programme.desc: A young Vladimir Putin emerges from the shadow of the Soviet Union; with detailed insight from academics, investigative journalists retrace the moments from his past that ushered in a new form of authoritarian leader.

programme.title: Inside the Mind of Vladimir Putin: Retribution
programme.desc: Retracing the moments from Putin's past that ushered in his reign.
